mapper.select: select no, title, name, thumbnail from gh_info order by w_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into gh_info(user_id, title, content, thumbnail, w_date, postcode, city, address, on_off, p_link, up_view, views, likes, name) values(#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnail}, now(), #{postcode}, #{city}, #{address}, "y", "n", "n", 0, 0, #{name})

insert into gh_more_info(no, party_menu, alcohol, party_time, off_time, join_man, join_girl, party_day, wifi, parking, morning, pet, check_in, check_out) values(#{no}, #{party_menu}, #{alcohol}, #{party_time}, #{off_time}, #{join_man}, #{join_girl}, #{party_day}, #{wifi}, #{parking}, #{morning}, #{pet}, #{check_in}, #{check_out})

insert into gh_room_info(no, room, room_status, price, photo, room_people, gender) values
(#{roomList.no}, #{roomList.room}, #{roomList.room_status}, #{roomList.price}, #{roomList.photo}, #{roomList.room_people}, #{roomList.gender})
mapper.update: update gh_info set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, w_date = now(), postcode = #{postcode}, city = #{city}, address = #{address}, name = #{name} where no = #{no}

update gh_more_info set party_menu = #{party_menu}, alcohol = #{alcohol}, party_time = #{party_time}, off_time = #{off_time}, join_man = #{join_man}, join_girl = #{join_girl}, party_day = #{party_day}, wifi = #{wifi}, parking = #{parking}, morning = #{morning}, pet = #{pet}, check_in = #{check_in}, check_out = #{check_out} where no = #{no}

update.foreach: update gh_room_info set room = #{roomList.room}, room_status = #{roomList.room_status}, price = #{roomList.price}, photo = #{roomList.photo}, room_people = #{roomList.room_people}, gender = #{roomList.gender} where no = #{roomList.no}

mapper.delete: delete gh_info, gh_more_info, gh_room_info, gh_view_info from gh_more_info left join gh_room_info on (gh_more_info.no = gh_room_info.no) left join gh_view_info on (gh_more_info.no = gh_view_info.no) left join gh_info on (gh_more_info.no = gh_info.no) where gh_more_info.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update gh_info set views = #{views} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select gi.no, gi.user_id, gi.title, gi.content, gi.address, gi.city, gi.views, gi.likes, gi.name, ui.user_name, ui.user_radio, ui.user_email, gmi.party_day, gmi.party_menu, gmi.party_time, gmi.alcohol, gmi.off_time, gmi.join_man, gmi.join_girl, gmi.wifi, gmi.parking, gmi.morning, gmi.pet, gmi.check_in, gmi.check_out from gh_info gi left join gh_more_info gmi on (gi.no = gmi.no) left join user_info ui on (gi.user_id = ui.user_id) where gi.no = #{no}
